body.raw:
# Introduction Devdocs is a documentation framework, designed to be fast, flexible, and composes seamlessly into your React framework. Devdocs has different parts:
} title="Devdocs Core" description="Handles most of the logic, including document search, content source adapters, and Markdown extensions." /> } title="Devdocs UI" description="The default theme of Fumadocs offers a beautiful look for documentation sites and interactive components." />
} title="Content Source" description="The source of your content, can be a CMS or local data layers like Fumadocs MDX (the official content source)." /> } title="Devdocs CLI" description="A command line tool to install UI components and automate things, useful for customizing layouts." /> ## Getting Started Here are some steps to get started: 1. **Step 1**: Do this. 2. **Step 2**: Do that. ## Further Reading Check out other sections for more details.
